010package imagingbook.core;
011
012import java.util.jar.Attributes;
013import java.util.jar.Manifest;
014
015/**
016 * This class provides version information for this library.
017 * See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3697449/retrieve-version-from-maven-pom-xml-in-code
018 * for alternatives.
019 * 
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 *
023 */
024public abstract class Info {
025        
026        /**
027         * Reads version information from the MANIFEST.MF file of the JAR file from
028         * which this class was loaded. 
029         * 
030         * @return A string with the version information. 
031         * "UNKNOWN" is returned if the library was not loaded from a JAR file or if 
032         * the version information could not be determined.
033         */
034        public static String getVersionInfo() {
035                Manifest mf = FileUtils.getJarManifest(Info.class);
036                if (mf == null) {
037                        return "UNKNOWN";
038                }
039                //IJ.log("listing attributes");
040                Attributes attr = mf.getMainAttributes();
041                String version = null;
042                String buildTime = null;
043                try {
044                        version = attr.getValue("Implementation-Version");
045                        buildTime = attr.getValue("Build-Time");
046                } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) { }
047                return version + " (" + buildTime + ")";
048        }
049
050}
